item.description:
borderland State Park will be our new on location photo shoot.

Some information / images of boarderlands can be found on there web page
http://www.mass.gov/d...


There are tons of elements to work with for amazing backgrounds such as a vine covered mansion,stone pond with a water fall , a stone cabin and much much much more


we will be breaking into teams so that way everyone gets a turn to shoot / hold reflector.


Lets meet at 9am in the main parking lot.
Parking ran $2 last year to park for the whole day.

Hope to see you there

Dave
item.how_to_find_us: let's meet in the parking lot
item.name: location shoot take two
